snippet: ALEXANDER--John. 1/21/47 - 10/27/15 Kipling might have written his famous lines to read-If you can talk with politicians and keep your virtue, Or walk with judges and jurists-nor loose the common touch; If he had had the honor and pleasure of knowing you, John. You are fondly remembered on your birthday. Val 1/3
lead_paragraph: ALEXANDER--John. 1/21/47 - 10/27/15 Kipling might have written his famous lines to read-If you can talk with politicians and keep your virtue, Or walk with judges and jurists-nor loose the common touch; If he had had the honor and pleasure of knowing you, John. You are fondly remembered on your birthday. Val 1/3
